name: Memory Kings
description:
Memory Kings is a mix of the games Chess and Pairs (a.k.a. Match Up or Concentration) for 1 to 4 players. Players command their pawns to explore and recruit forces to their side. They must find divided troops to recruit them by strategically moving the pawns across the field, and soliciting rooks, bishops, knights, or the Queen herself to escort them. The player that recruits the most pairs wins!

You can learn it in less than 5 minutes and the mechanics are light enough so kids and the most casual players will be hooked instantly. However, there's strategical depth that will satisfy the most competitive players. Even more exciting, as one of the main skills required to master Memory Kings is... well... Memory, don't be surprised if you find yourself in a balanced match against your younger children!

The Digital Version Game Screens Features
  • Play in all player counts (1-4) on the same screen;
  • Large Grid and Alternate Setup variants;
  • In-game Rulebook;
  • Automatic card flipping, recruiting, and Counter King movement on Solo Mode;
  • Forbidden pawn placement and movements marked during play.
  • Stat recording of Solo Games;
  • Reveal all board at the end of the game;
  • Toggle sounds off and on;

Current Version: This Digital Version (v0.1.1 Early Access) was developed in Python 3.9 / Pygame 2.0.

Requirements: Windows 64 bit.

Development: I am currently working on a refactoring of the game using the Godot 3 Engine, so it will be easier to provide executables for different OS and maybe mobile.
